SELECT d.* FROM devops_env_command d WHERE d.object = #{objectType} and d.object_id = #{objectId}
AND d.creation_date >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND d.creation_date <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')
